majority.translation[0].definitions[0].d: most of the people or things in a group
majority.translation[0].definitions[0].e: In the vast majority of cases the disease is fatal.

majority.translation[0].definitions[0].n: You use a plural verb with  the majority of, when it is followed by a plural noun
The majority of patients are women
You use a plural verb with the majority on its own, when you are considering members of a group as individual people
He sees several patients a day The majority are women
You usually use a singular verb with majority, when considering people as a single group  In British English, you can also use a plural verb in this meaning
The majority is unwilling to listen to the views of the minority
